get.description: Get more detail of your account.
See all the people in your account.
See all members in your account.
See all guests in your account.
Get a list of all projects within your account.

post.description: Create a new project. The project will initially have no members.

get.description: Get a list of active projects within your account.
Show details for a specific project.

delete.description: Delete a project and all associated data.

put.description: Update settings for an existing project under your control.

post.description: Add a member to a project.

post.summary: Add a guest to a project.
post.description: Add an existing guest to a project.

get.description: Get a full list of tasks for a project

post.description: Add a new task in a project

get.description: List details of a task in a given project, includes all data including comments, attachments, etc.

put.description: Update one of the tasks in a project.

get.description: Get a full list of columns for a project

post.description: Create a new column on a project

get.description: List details of a column in a given project,

put.description: Update a column on a project

get.description: Get a paginated list of comments for a task.

post.description: Adds a new comment to the specified task.

get.description: Get a paginated list of attachments for a task.

post.description: Adds a new attachment to the specified task using an existing URL.

delete.description: Delete an attachment from a task

post.description: Upload a new attachment and add it to the specified task. The file contents need to be specified as the POST data on this request.
